H0.text: On which Scottish island is Brodick Castle. Isle of Skye

H1.text: On which Scottish island is Brodick Castle. Isle of Mull

H2.text: On which Scottish island is Brodick Castle. Isle of Bute

H3.text: On which Scottish island is Brodick Castle. Arran

A4.text: Brodick Castle is a castle situated outside the port of Brodick on the Isle of Arran, an island in the Firth of Clyde, Scotland.
